How can aeroponics be used for urban farming education?

How can aeroponics be used for urban farming education?

agritecture:

This blog post was written by Camille Richman, an undergrad researcher at the MIT CityFARM.

In January 2014, MIT CityFARM and the Ecological Greenhouse at Kibbutz Ein Shemer in Israel collaborated on an initiative to build an educational aeroponic farming program. Sponsored by MIT…
